title: Biden Discusses With Allies ‘Dangerous’ Cooperation Between Russia and North Korea

summary: The hourlong call centered on what German officials said was a push to end the war in Ukraine. It was the first in two years between Mr. Putin and Chancellor Olaf Scholz
